home.heroTitle: Collect, Trade, Connect — All in One Place
home.heroSubtitle: Discover new cards, manage your collection, and trade worldwide.
home.wishlistDescription: Pick the cards you dream of having and those you're happy to exchange.
home.findPartnerDescription: Use our smart matching engine to find perfect trade partners.
home.startTradingActionDescription: Chat, negotiate, and finalize trades easily in our platform.
home.testimonial1: Finally, a single platform where I can manage my entire collection and swap cards with ease.
home.testimonial2: The real-time updates make trading feel seamless.
home.testimonial3: I finally found a trading partner to complete my set, LET'S GO !.
home.finalCtaTitle: Join BulbaTrade Today and Transform Your Card Trading Experience
